product_name: Kenra ProfessionalTravel Size Platinum Blow-Dry Spray
summary: SummaryHighlightsCruelty FreeVeganKenra Platinum Blow-Dry Spray is a lightweight formula that dramatically decreases blow-dry time and provides intense heat protection from damage and breakage. Now in travel size.
details: DetailsBenefitsDecreases blow-dry time by 50%Detangles, smooths, and softensEliminates frizz and resists humidityProvides thermal protection up to 428 degrees FItem 2233329How To UseSpray evenly on damp hair, layer with favorite Kenra Professional Platinum styling product (optional), and blow-dry.IngredientsCyclopentasiloxane, Dimethicone, Dimethicone Crosspolymer, Dimethicone/Vinyl Dimethicone Crosspolymer, Dimethiconol, Sodium Laneth 40 Maleate/Styrene Sulfonate Copolymer, PEG-10 Dimethicone, Parfum/Fragrance, Argania Spinosa (Argan) Kernal Oil, Simmondsia Chinensis (Jojoba) Seed Oil.
how_to_use: Spray evenly on damp hair, layer with favorite Kenra Professional Platinum styling product (optional), and blow-dry.

reviews.headline: New Favorite
reviews.comments: I've used this on clients hair in the past, but used in on mine for the first time - instantly fell in love. Not only does it help my dry time go faster, it makes my hair so soft and I love the smell of it!

reviews.headline: I love this product!
reviews.comments: I use this with my blow dry for silky smooth hair. Leaves my hair smooth and smells wonderful!

reviews.headline: The best!!
reviews.comments: Kenra products are my saving grace for the humidity in New Orleans! I can walk outside and within seconds I'm a big frizzy mess. These products are a game changer for anyone who battles frizzy hair!

reviews.headline: Love love love!
reviews.comments: This is a staple! I have been using this product for many years and love how soft and shiny it makes my hair when I use heat on it. Also smells amazing!

reviews.headline: Thee Best heat protector!!
reviews.comments: this is by far the best heat protectant ive ever bought! other pricy ones have left my hair feeling rusty and nasty but this one leaves it smooth shiny and smelling delicious! buy the big one trust me

reviews.headline: Product works great
reviews.comments: Love this stuff. Makes my hair so soft and shinie. Helps defrizz my hair and gives a beautiful fresh look.

reviews.headline: I Love Kenra platinum Blow Dry Spray! Protects bleached hair
reviews.comments: Kenra Platinum Blow Dry Spray protects bleached highlights. Use on wet hair after shampooing and also dry hair before heat styling! Makes your hair feel healthy and shinny! Love this product, saved my highlights from breakage, keeps color bright! ❤️

reviews.headline: Amazing product!
reviews.comments: I have used this for years and have even bought it for friends and got them hooked too!

reviews.headline: I would buy this product again and again
reviews.comments: i absolutely love this product it makes my hair so shiny and soft

reviews.headline: I will be buying the larger size
Nice product!
reviews.comments: I have hair that is 100% frizzy and way uncontrollable sometimes. I have tried many products and although I have only used this a few times so far, it really is a good fit for my hair. It still has its management issues, but helps a lot. The smell is a win as well! I'm not sure exactly how to describe it really, except it reminds me of candy! My stylist at Ulta used it on my hair and I knew I needed this product!

reviews.headline: I would buy this product again and again!!
reviews.comments: One of the most amazing products I've ever used for my hair!!

reviews.headline: I will buy this product again soon.   Love ,❤️ love love it.
reviews.comments: Smooth ,silky texture and pleasant smell.  Very pleased with the results.

reviews.headline: Kenra
reviews.comments: I have used this for years, great smell.

reviews.headline: No, will not purchase again
reviews.comments: I used this once, it did seem to work fine but I could not stand the smell. I usually wash my hair every 2-3 days and even the second day I could not stand the smell.

reviews.headline: stunning smell
reviews.comments: I love how it leave my hair feeling and smelling! just amazing product 9/10

reviews.headline: Fantastic! Love and will buy again.
I forget how amazing this stuff is...
reviews.comments: So I have wavy frizzy hair, I straighten often, and often times I buy new products to test out forgetting about this one but I ALWAYS end up going back. It smooths out beautifully, cuts down drying time, and the smell is divine! 10/10 recommend.

faceoff_positive.comments: I learned about this blow-dry spray through a stylist that used it on me. It smells amazing. It also cut the blow drying time way down. I hate blow drying because I end up with an frizz but this stuff is great. Even when I let my hair air dry overnight I still wake up with manageable hair that is already heat protected and can iron it in less than 20 minutes. My hair is long (hips) and extremely coarse and thick. I use it daily. My stylist even says how "healthy" my hair looks and can't believe I iron it almost daily.
faceoff_positive.headline: LOVE LOVE LOVE

faceoff_negative.comments:
I purchased this spray at the recommendation of a brand-happy friend. She suggested the mist, but my Ulta only had the spray in stock. I wrongly figured this is what she was talking about. 

I have a whole lot of very fine, very straight hair. I air dry my hair at night, giving a quick flat ironing in the morning to take the Texas humidity. I used this spray on large strands of my sectioned-off head, and the only lasting effect was a greasy head. I was seriously oily from scalp to ends after only a few sprays! 

Maybe the mist would be better suited to my hair type, but I wanted to give a heads up to other fine-haired ladies.
faceoff_negative.headline: Not for fine hair
